<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- SpeculativeExecution.cpp ---------------------------------&#42;- C++ -&#42;-===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass hoists instructions to enable speculative execution on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// targets where branches are expensive. This is aimed at GPUs. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// currently works on simple if-then and if-then-else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// patterns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Removing branches is not the only motivation for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass. E.g. consider this code and assume that there is no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addressing mode for multiplying by sizeof(&#42;a):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (b &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     c = a&#91;i + 1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (d &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     e = a&#91;i + 2&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// turns into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   p = &amp;a&#91;i + 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (b &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     c = &#42;p;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   q = &amp;a&#91;i + 2&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (d &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     e = &#42;q;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which could later be optimized to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   r = &amp;a&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (b &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     c = r&#91;1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (d &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     e = r&#91;2&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Later passes sink back much of the speculated code that did not enable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// further optimization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass is more aggressive than the function SpeculativeyExecuteBB in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SimplifyCFG. SimplifyCFG will not speculate if no selects are introduced and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it will speculate at most one instruction. It also will not speculate if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is a value defined in the if-block that is only used in the then-block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These restrictions make sense since the speculation in SimplifyCFG seems</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aimed at introducing cheap selects, while this pass is intended to do more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aggressive speculation while counting on later passes to either capitalize on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that or clean it up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the pass was created by calling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// createSpeculativeExecutionIfHasBranchDivergencePass or the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -spec-exec-only-if-divergent-target option is present, this pass only has an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// effect on targets where TargetTransformInfo::hasBranchDivergence() is true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on other targets, it is a nop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This lets you include this pass unconditionally in the IR pass pipeline, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only enable it for relevant targets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/speculativeexecution-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar/SpeculativeExecution.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/valuetracking-h">llvm/Analysis/ValueTracking.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">llvm/IR/Instructions.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">llvm/IR/IntrinsicInst.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operator-h">llvm/IR/Operator.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/initializepasses-h">llvm/InitializePasses.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/commandline-h">llvm/Support/CommandLine.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h">llvm/Support/Debug.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/scalar-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE &quot;speculative-execution&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The risk that speculation will not pay off increases with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of instructions speculated, so we put a limit on that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="#a75912443a19913406c350b2c088579c7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a75912443a19913406c350b2c088579c7">SpecExecMaxSpeculationCost</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;spec-exec-max-speculation-cost&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(7), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Speculative execution is not applied to basic blocks where &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;the cost of the instructions to speculatively execute &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;exceeds this limit.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Speculating just a few instructions from a larger block tends not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be profitable and this limit prevents that. A reason for that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that small basic blocks are more likely to be candidates for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// further optimization.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not hoist any debug info intrinsics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (cond) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   x = y &#42; z;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   foo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -------- Which then becomes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if.then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %x = mul i32 %y, %z</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void @llvm.dbg.value(%x, !&quot;x&quot;, !DIExpression())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call void foo()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SpeculativeExecution might decide to hoist the &#39;y &#42; z&#39; calculation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out of the &#39;if&#39; block, because it is more efficient that way, so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;%x = mul i32 %y, %z&#39; moves to the block above. But it might also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decide to hoist the &#39;llvm.dbg.value&#39; call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is incorrect, because even if we&#39;ve moved the calculation of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;y &#42; z&#39;, we should not see the value of &#39;x&#39; change unless we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually go inside the &#39;if&#39; block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SpeculativeExecutionPass::considerHoistingFromTo(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> NotHoisted;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasNoUnhoistedInstr = &#91;&amp;NotHoisted&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Values) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V : Values) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NotHoisted.contains(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
